segments.text: Howdy ! Nice car ! What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t know ! This stupid old car started spewing white smoke and it just died on me . Luckily , I managed to start it up and drive it here . What do you think it is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not sure yet.How about you pop the hood and we can take a look . Mmmm , it doesn ’ t look good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you mean ? My daddy gave me this car for my birthday last month . It ’ s brand new !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well missy , the white smoke that you saw is steam from the radiator . You overheated your engine so now the pistons are busted and so is your transmission . You should have called us and we could have towed you over here when your car died .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ugh ... So how long is this going to take ? An hour ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m afraid a bit more than that . We need to order the spare parts , take apart your electrical system , fuel pump and engine and then put it back together again . You are going to have to leave it here for at least two weeks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ! How am I supposed to get to school or go shopping ? This is not happening !
segments.speaker: S2
